name: Save My Kitty
overview: Save My Kitty is a quick paced hammer ticket redemption machine from Bromley Games. This game is similar to "Whack a Mole", where players are to hit objects with a hammer when they appear. Save My Kitty ticket redemption machines concept is simple, players are to hit dogs with a hammer as the dogs leave the kennel, the more dogs you hit, the quicker the dogs will leave their kennel leaving you short of breath and saving your kitty!
